author: pietjepuk
content:
<@!552133098075193354> Not quite sure if you're the one to ask this (are you still championing/coordinating EIP-1559?), but in relation to this https://discordapp.com/channels/595666850260713488/692078615269212180/824583682970484756:

It would be nice if the authors/developers of EIP-1559 could weigh in on whether:
1) the base fee should be able to go to zero --> the code/spec needs to be fixed (e.g. https://discordapp.com/channels/595666850260713488/692078615269212180/824590302546624565 )
2) it's fine that the base fee cannot drop below `BASE_FEE_MAX_CHANGE_DENOMINATOR  - 1` (= 7) --> mentions of base fee dropping to zero (and possibly the `max(..., 0)`) should be removed from/changed in the EIP to avoid confusion.

There's no particular hurry to fix it I think, but if you're keeping a list of things still to test/discuss/coordinate/tune anyway, it might be better to put it on there (before it's swamped by the general discussion here)
